title: LF Gold duo to get to Plat
body:
JG main (Zac or Ivern) looking for mid, top or Ad that I can just snowball to plat :) 

IGN = Holli

replies.body:
Hey bro, I was g3 but dropped to s4 due to some pretty bad toxic/ tilted games. But I'm reformed now and back to S1 on my way up. 

I like your jg picks. I'm an adc/ mid main but can do pretty much everything well. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
you added me then removed me ? Stop looking for a carry Scrub :)
yeah only because I see that you are a sup main, probs not the best combo
